content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Entity placement distance error:
  • When placing an entity, confirm that the player’s position is within the allowed range.
- Entity placement collision and spacing error:
  • When positioning an entity next to an existing structure, ensure there is sufficient spacing and no obstruction (such as nearby entities or unbuildable terrain). Adjust spacing or change placement direction to avoid collisions.
- Attribute access error:
  • When using positional attributes (for example, accessing the center of a buildable area), refer to them as properties rather than calling them as functions.
- Insufficient inventory for placement:
  • Before attempting to place an entity (such as an assembling machine), verify that it is present in the inventory.
